techmeme.title: Trump plans to nominate former SEC Commissioner Paul Atkins as SEC chair, keeping with his promise for a crypto-friendly administration (Jeff Cox/CNBC)
At the DealBook Summit, Sam Altman says "it would be profoundly un-American to use political power to hurt" competitors and "I don't think Elon would do it" (Jackie Davalos/Bloomberg)
Google DeepMind unveils GenCast, an AI weather model that the company claims outperforms traditional methods on up to 15-day weather and deadly storm forecasts (William J. Broad/New York Times)
The UK NCA uncovers a Russian multibillion-dollar money laundering scheme that let Russian spies, European drug traffickers, and more evade sanctions via crypto (Financial Times)
Sam Altman says OpenAI will begin 12 days of "shipmas" on December 5, with new features, products, and demos, sources say including text-to-video AI tool Sora (The Verge)
